模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.demo.Actor

接口 Destructible

所有已知实现类:
ActiveActorDestructible, AmmoBox, Boss, BossProjectile, EnemyPlane, EnemyProjectile, FighterPlane, Heart, MutationBoss1, MutationBoss2, MutationBoss3, MutationBossProjectile1, MutationBossProjectile2, MutationBossProjectile3, Projectile, UserPlane, UserProjectile
public interface Destructible
Interface for objects that can be destroyed or damaged. Any class implementing this interface should provide the logic for taking damage and being destroyed.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    destroy()
    Destroys the object.
    void
    takeDamage()
    Applies damage to the object.

  • 方法详细资料

    • takeDamage

      void takeDamage()
      Applies damage to the object. The implementation should define how the object responds to taking damage (e.g., reducing health).

    • destroy

      void destroy()
      Destroys the object. The implementation should define what happens when the object is destroyed (e.g., removal from the game, triggering effects).
